title: Child adopted out
childQuestion: Did {deceasedName} legally adopt you out of their family (give you up for adoption)?
grandchildQuestion: Did {deceasedName} legally adopt your parent ({deceasedName}’s child) out of their family (give them up for adoption)?
parentQuestion: Did you legally adopt {deceasedName} out of your family (give them up for adoption)?

adoptedOut.requiredChild: Select ‘Yes’ if {deceasedName} gave you up for adoption
adoptedOut.requiredGrandchild: Select ‘Yes’ if {deceasedName} gave your parent up for adoption
adoptedOut.requiredParent: Select ‘Yes’ if you gave {deceasedName} up for adoption
